## SeisFluid class

Convenience class that combines multiple interfaces of the library in one object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SeisFluid implements ReadableSeisFluid, TransactableFluid 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ReadableSeisFluid](./lib-ethers.readableethersfluid.md)<!-- -->, [TransactableFluid](./lib-base.transactablefluid.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `SeisFluid` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [connection](./lib-ethers.ethersfluid.connection.md) |  | [SeisFluidConnection](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnection.md) | Information about the connection to the Fluid protocol. |
|  [populate](./lib-ethers.ethersfluid.populate.md) |  | [PopulatableSeisFluid](./lib-ethers.populatableethersfluid.md) | Can be used to create populated (unsigned) transactions. |
|  [send](./lib-ethers.ethersfluid.send.md) |  | [SendableSeisFluid](./lib-ethers.sendableethersfluid.md) | Can be used to send transactions without waiting for them to be mined. |
